alert.note: Alert for Bath (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Bath County through 430 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Warm Springs, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millboro... Warm Springs... Nimrod Hall... and Yost. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
